Class FinalLevelWorld

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.worlds.GameWorld
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.worlds.FinalLevelWorld
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class FinalLevelWorld extends GameWorld
FinalLevelWorld inherit from GameWorld. FinalLevelWorld is level only contain Hero and a Boss.
Author:
YuyanZhou
